entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 7:43 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
